column3: This is just to show that libsecp256k1's deterministic signing (#5220) and the OpenSSL-based deterministic signing (#5227) are compatible with eachother, so switching between them will not change the signatures produced (and the tests from #5227 remain useful).\n
Closing this as I'm not going to keep both #5220 and this one up to date. I'll rebase #5220 and #5227 as necessary.\n
